title: Do you think international relations is a viable degree? - Quora

response.answer_text: I do think that international relations is a viable degree. Not only that on it's own could be the key to good jobs but if combined with positions that have an international dimention such as international marketing, sales, services, support etc. The degree becomes very valuable.

I think yes because it opens horizons. It’s a degree that as years pass has every day more viability. Globalization is in our days a reality. These degree gives you the weapons to face the futur without being hiden in your below.
